thread.section_title: Euroflorist Deutschland Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Euroflorist Deutschland | euroflorist.de
thread.title: Dorothea

author: Dorothea
title: Dorothea
text: I ordered flowers from Australia to be delivered in Germany on 2 separate occasions, and both times it was such an easy transaction. The flowers were delivered the same day, and the recipient was very happy. The value for money was very good, and I was particularly happy not to be charged a huge amount for the delivery costs (like some other sites do). I was very happy with the service and will definitely use them again in the future.
